## bntoolkit insert

Insert a hash or a file of hashes in the DB

### Synopsis

Insert a hash or a file of hashes in the DB.
For example:
	bntoolkit insert hashes.txt

```
bntoolkit insert <hash/file> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for insert
```
